member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_COLLISION_RECORD_TYPE
member.summary: The LSA_FOREST_TRUST_COLLISION_RECORD_TYPE enumeration defines the types of collision that can occur between Local Security Authority forest trust records.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_COLLISION_RECORD_TYPE.CollisionTdo
member.summary: Collision between TrustedDomain objects. This indicates a collision with a namespace element of another forest.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_COLLISION_RECORD_TYPE.CollisionXref
member.summary: Collision between cross-references. This indicates a collision with a domain in the same forest.

member.name: LSA_FOREST_TRUST_COLLISION_RECORD_TYPE.CollisionOther
member.summary: Collision that is not a collision between TrustedDomain objects or cross-references.
